AdafruitDcMotor - Class in com.pi4j.component.adafruithat
This java class commands DC motors wired to the "Adafruit DC and Stepper Motor HAT" developed for the Raspberry Pi.
AdafruitDcMotor(AdafruitMotorHat, String) - Constructor for class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitDcMotor
Constructor
AdafruitDcMotorHatExample - Class in <Unnamed>
Example program commanding a DC Motor wired to a AdafruitMotorHat.
AdafruitDcMotorHatExample() - Constructor for class AdafruitDcMotorHatExample
 
AdafruitHat - Class in com.pi4j.component.adafruithat
This supper class developed to interface with both the "Adafruit DC and Stepper Motor HAT" and the "Adafruit Servo HAT" developed for the Raspberry Pi.
AdafruitHat(int) - Constructor for class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat
Pass AdafruitHat device address to constructor.
AdafruitHat(int, int) - Constructor for class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat
Pass I2C Bus number and Adafruit Hat device address to constructor.
AdafruitMotorHat - Class in com.pi4j.component.adafruithat
This class extends the AdafruitHat superclass and handles the specific operating commanding for DC and Stepper motors.
AdafruitMotorHat(int) - Constructor for class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitMotorHat
 
AdafruitMotorHat(int, int) - Constructor for class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitMotorHat
 
AdafruitServo - Class in com.pi4j.component.adafruithat
This java class commands a servo wired to the "Adafruit Servo HAT" developed for the Raspberry Pi.

Constructor
AdafruitServoHat - Class in com.pi4j.component.adafruithat
This class extends the AdafruitHat superclass and handles the specific operating commanding for servos.
AdafruitServoHat(int) - Constructor for class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitServoHat
 
AdafruitServoHat(int, int) - Constructor for class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitServoHat

AdafruitStepperMotor - Class in com.pi4j.component.adafruithat
This java class has been developed to command stepper motors wired to a "Adafruit DC and Stepper Motor HAT" developed for the Raspberry Pi

AdafruitStepperMotorHatExample - Class in <Unnamed>
Demonstrate commanding a single stepper motor wired to an "Adafruit DC and Stepper Motor HAT" for the Raspberry Pi computer.

ALL_LED_OFF_H - Variable in class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat
12-bit high-byte for turn off time for all PWMs
ALL_LED_OFF_L - Variable in class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat
12-bit low-byte for turn off time for all PWMs
ALL_LED_ON_H - Variable in class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat
12-bit high-byte for turn on time for all PWMs
ALL_LED_ON_L - Variable in class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat
12-bit low-byte for turn on time for all PWMs
ALLCALLADR - Variable in class com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat

autoExposureMode - Variable in class eric.camera.canon.CanonCamera
The auto exposure returns values: "P", "TV", "AV", "Manual", "Bulb"
